com.brightcove.player.render

Class AbstractRendererBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.render.AbstractRendererBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.RendererBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DashRendererBuilder, ExtractorRendererBuilder, HLSRendererBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractRendererBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.RendererBuilder
    Abstract Renderer Builder that contains common logic and default configuration across several specific Renderer Builders.

      • getAudioTracksIndexMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getAudioTracksIndexMap(com.google.android.exoplayer.ExoPlayer exoPlayer,
                                                                       int timeMs)
        Retrieves a map of the Audio track language strings available for the current video and their indices with respect of ExoPlayer.
        Parameters:
        exoPlayer - the exo player object
        timeMs - the time in ms
        Returns:
        the audio tracks index map
        See Also:
        ExoPlayer#getTrackCount(int)}, ExoPlayer#getTrackFormat(int, int)}

      • getMediaFormatListByType

        @Nullable
public static java.util.List<com.google.android.exoplayer.MediaFormat> getMediaFormatListByType(com.google.android.exoplayer.ExoPlayer exoPlayer,
                                                                                         int trackType)
        Gets a media format list by track type. The type can be ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.TYPE_VIDEO,ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.TYPE_AUDIO, ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.TYPE_TEXT or ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.TYPE_METADATA
        Parameters:
        exoPlayer - the exo player
        trackType - the track type.
        Returns:
        the media format list by type

      • getHttpReadTimeoutMillis

        protected int getHttpReadTimeoutMillis()
        Gets http read timeout value in milliseconds. If a RendererConfig was not set or the timeout is zero, the default value will be returned: DefaultHttpDataSource.DEFAULT_READ_TIMEOUT_MILLIS
        Returns:
        Integer timeout value

      • getHttpConnectTimeoutMillis

        protected int getHttpConnectTimeoutMillis()
        Gets http connect timeout value in milliseconds. If a RendererConfig was not set or the timeout is zero, the default value will be returned: DefaultHttpDataSource.DEFAULT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MILLIS
        Returns:
        Integer timeout value
